page.title: 14The Lynhurst Hotel Johnstone
page.content: The Lynhurst Hotel is situated on a quiet road near Johnstone town centre. The Lynhurst has a good reputation in Johnstone and regularly holds functions in its own private function suite. It has two pool tables, a dart board and a bar. It also has a garden where you can sunbathe on a sunny day. Across the road from the Lynhurst there is a field with ponies and donkeys in it. Next to it there are Municipal bowling greens, putting, tennis courts and a BMX bike course. In the summer the fair comes to the public park which is just 200 yards away from the Lynhurst Hotel. The Lynhurst is the ideal place for a holiday in Johnstone for a family.
